banner_title: Build AAC boards with the power of AI
banner_subtitle: Designed for therapists, educators, and caregivers. Generate personalized augmentative communication boards instantly with Cboard AI Builder.
feature_desc1: Quickly generate AAC core boards using essential, high-frequency vocabulary tailored to each user’s needs. Save time and support more effective communication from the start.
feature_desc2: Missing a symbol? No problem. Our AI creates custom pictograms when existing images aren’t available, ensuring full visual support for every word or phrase.
feature_desc3: Move from board creation to communication in one click. Instantly export your custom AAC boards to the Cboard application with full compatibility and no extra setup.
testi1: This tool has completely changed how I build AAC boards. What used to take me hours now takes minutes—and the results are even more personalized.
testi2: The AI-generated pictograms are a game changer. No more workarounds or missing images—we always have exactly what we need.
testi2Title: Assistive Technology Specialist, Oak Valley School District
testi3: As a special educator, I create multiple boards a week. Cboard AI Builder has cut my prep time in half without sacrificing quality.
testi3Title: Special Education Teacher, Maple Grove Elementary
testi4: I love the integration with the Cboard app—it’s seamless. I can create and deploy boards in one smooth workflow.
testi5: Finally, an AAC tool that puts powerful AI into the hands of educators and therapists. It’s intuitive, efficient, and deeply thoughtful.
testi5Title: Director of Assistive Communication, Bright Horizons Foundation
testi6: Being able to generate core vocabulary boards so quickly has made a huge impact on my caseload. It’s a brilliant tool.
testi7: The user experience is amazing—simple enough for anyone to use, but powerful under the hood. A true innovation in AAC tech.
testi8: I work in low-resource settings, and this AI tool helps me provide high-quality AAC boards without needing a big team or budget.
testi9: Custom pictogram creation has opened up new possibilities for children with rare conditions or very specific vocabulary needs.
testi10: The speed and flexibility of this tool are unmatched. I now recommend it to every therapist I train.
testi10Title: AAC Trainer & Clinical Supervisor, VoicePath Institute
pricing_subtitle: The best value designed for your workplace, starting at just $24/user/month.
faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
